description: **BY CLICKING THE ✅ BELOW, YOU AGREE TO THESE RULES, SERVER RULES POSTED IN <#1042594182826565674> AND WILL RECEIVE THE MEMBER ROLE THAT GIVES YOU FULL ACCESS TO THIS SERVER WHERE YOU CAN CREATE ANY LEGAL SHINY/NORMAL POKEMON FOR SCARLET/VIOLET, SWORD/SHIELD, BRILLIANT DIAMOND/SHINING PEARL, POKEMON LEGENDS ARCEUS, AND PARTICIPATE IN SHINY RAIDS.**

fields.name: __Rule 1__
fields.value: > You agree to read the Tutorials and FAQs that we have available before attempting to create any Pokémon or before asking

fields.name: __Rule 2__
fields.value: > When asking for help you will ask in <#> and provide any and all information. You will not ask any bot related questions in <#906739960084856832>. You will be directed to the FAQs or Tutorials if your question is already answered there.

fields.name: __Rule 3__
fields.value: > When asking for help don't lie when asked what set you are trying to create. We have logs and can see if the info you provided us is the same as the info you submitted to the bot.

fields.name: __Rule 4__
fields.value: > Do Not use our services for financial gain.

fields.name: __Rule 5__
fields.value: > If a bot is down Do Not ask when it will be back up.

fields.name: __Rule 6__
fields.value: > Do Not spam the bot channel with illegal sets and Do Not request stupid stuff or things that cant be possible. “I wanted to try” or other excuses are not valid excuse for you to try and create stupid stuff.

fields.name: __Rule 7__
fields.value: > Do Not create alt accounts to queue yourself multiple times and skip wait time.

fields.name: __Rule 8__
fields.value: > Do Not create Pokémon with more than one OT unless it's an event Pokémon.

fields.name: __Rule 9__
fields.value: > There is no reason for you to create multiple of the same Pokémon. A handful of 1 specific Pokémon should be enough.

fields.name: __Rule 10__
fields.value: > Only trade to one account and only for yourself. The bot will prevent you from trading if it links to a different account when trading you.

fields.name: __Rule 11__
fields.value: > You understand that using the bots requires some kind of Pokémon knowledge and common sense. This includes trading mechanics and basic Pokémon knowledge.

fields.name: __Rule 12__
fields.value: > Do not give the Pokémon you create here inappropriate nicknames.

fields.name: __Rule 13__
fields.value: > Do not delete messages that you have sent in <#808182861571686430>. When you delete messages after someone has replied to you, the person replying looks insane by talking to themselves. Further, if someone has the same question as you they can search for your previously answered question unless its been deleted.
